attributes.action: ensure that all Ministers accused of misusing their rights to expenses are investigated as any public citizen would be
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Much controversy has been generated over the issue of expenses for MPs. We should press the Prime Minister to ensure that these MPs not only pay back what they have taken but face punishment legally as any regular member of the public would be in a similar situation.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
